name: Seppuku Labyrinth
description:
A game I started in high school for ICT.

Your job is reach the centre of the maze to retrieve the Knife of the Ancients.
You've brought your trusty knife, but no way of keeping track of your path through the maze.

That is, other than stabbing yourself and spilling blood on the floor.

Controls:
W/A/S/D for movement
Left Mouse to stab yourself
F to interact with items
